docs.lead_paragraph: CHICAGO, Oct. 18--As more and more progress is made in preventing and curing the old childhood diseases the nation's "baby doctors" find themselves increasingly concerned with chronic conditions, speeches delivered at the American Academy of Pediatrics, meeting here today, indicate.

headline.main: PEDIATRIC STRESS IS ON CHRONIC ILLS; Academy Sessions Turn From Old Childhood Diseases to Palsy and Polio

byline.original: By DOROTHY BARCLAY Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES
